Title: Mipsy Mole-Rider
Description:
Time for happy story. Not all days bad.

<Granny Scribbles gently scratches Ol' Snorler behind his ears.>

Tell story of how be friends with moles. Story of Mipsy mole-rider...
RewardText:
Tenderfoots always fan of that one.

What you think of mole? Think ride good as Mipsy?
